title: ChatGPT Plus Subscription Guide: Cost, Benefits, & More

steps.title: Get access to ChatGPT even when demand is high.
steps.content: Get access to ChatGPT even when demand is high. By upgrading to ChatGPT Plus, you won't have to worry about the "ChatGPT is at capacity right now" error. Paying for a ChatGPT Plus subscription ensures you'll be able to use ChatGPT at peak times. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Access to higher limits of GPT-4o and o4-mini models.
steps.content: Access to higher limits of GPT-4o and o4-mini models. With a free account, you only have access to 10 messages to OpenAI's GPT-4o and o4-mini language models every five hours. ChatGPT Plus allows up to 5x higher limits of GPT-4o and o4-mini models.

steps.title: The ability to use GPT-4.5, more reasoning models, and Sora video generation.
steps.content: The ability to use GPT-4.5, more reasoning models, and Sora video generation. With a free account, you only have access to OpenAI's GPT-4o mini, GPT-4o and o4-mini language models. ChatGPT Plus is based on the much-improved GPT-4.5, o3, and o4-mini-high which have a better accuracy rate and can complete and reason more complex tasks. It can also generate videos using Sora video generation. Even though the ChatGPT Plus will give you more accurate answers than the free version of ChatGPT, it's still capable of making mistakes. Always do research before implementing ChatGPT-written code , essays , or other responses.

steps.title: Faster response speeds.
steps.content: Faster response speeds. When you're using the free version of ChatGPT, the chatbot's responses can sometimes lag, throw errors, or cut off mid-sentence . Upgrading to ChatGPT Plus improves these responses times and minimizes how often you'll receive those cut-off answers.

steps.title: Access to the latest features.
steps.content: Access to the latest features. As OpenAI continues to add new features to ChatGPT, ChatGPT Plus subscribers will be the first to get access to the latest features, tweaks, and enhancements. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Sign in to ChatGPT.
steps.content: Sign in to ChatGPT. Go to https://chat.openai.com in a web browser and log in with your ChatGPT account . If you're having trouble logging in, check out our ChatGPT login troubleshooting guide .

steps.title: Click Upgrade plan.
steps.content: Click Upgrade plan . You'll see this option at the bottom-left side of ChatGPT.

steps.title: Click Get Plus.
steps.content: Click Get Plus . This green button appears below the current price of ChatGPT in your region. You'll be taken to a payment form. Your total, including any applicable taxes, will appear.

steps.title: Enter your payment details and click Subscribe.
steps.content: Enter your payment details and click Subscribe . ChatGPT Plus uses Stripe to process payments, so you can pay with any Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, Discover card, and others. [3] X Research source Once you process your payment, you'll have instant access to ChatGPT Plus. If you have trouble signing up for ChatGPT Plus or run into billing problems, go to https://help.openai.com , click the chat icon at the bottom-right, then choose Billing to contact support. [4] X Research source
